entries.meaning: A currency unit of both ancient and modern Israel.

examples: Her gownlet cost five hundred beans; / Her furs, four figures in a row; / Her hat removed from papa's jeans / A hundred shekels more or so.

entries.meaning: (historical) An ancient unit of weight equivalent to one-fiftieth of a mina.
